pkgmetadata.longdescription: The p-generalized normal distribution // Evaluation of the pdf and the cdf of the univariate p-generalized normal distribution. Sampling from the p-generalized normal distribution using either the p-generalized polar method, the p-generalized rejecting polar method, the Monty Python method, the Ziggurat method or the method of Nardon and Pianca. The package also includes routines for the simulation of the bivariate, p-generalized uniform distribution on the p-generalized unit circle and the simulation of the corresponding angular distribution.
